titles.title: A resolution expressing the opposition of the House of Representatives to the proposed World Bank loan to restructure Mexico's steel industry.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Development Institutions and Finance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 3/2/1988--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) the proposed loan by the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development for Mexico's steel industry is not in the best interests of the United States or in the best interests of Mexico's economic revitalization; and (2) the United States should use its best efforts to prevent approval of such loan.
